name: Game Boy Gallery
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5b Details Title Game Boy Gallery Model No. DMG-AGGA Series Game Boy Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date April 27, 1995 Chipset Sharp LR35902 ( 4.2 MHz ) Description

Game Boy Gallery™ is a collection of five classic Game & Watch™ titles from Nintendo remade for the Game Boy™.

Gameplay

Play updated versions of the following five classic Game & Watch™ titles:

  • Ball
    Can you juggle three balls without dropping them.
     
  • Vermin
    Moles are taking over and it's your job to stop them.
     
  • Flagman
    Have some fun with flags.
     
  • Manhole
    Stop people from falling through the open manholes.
     
  • Cement Factory
    Operate concrete mixers to load cement in to trucks.
     
Controls Keyboard Start Enter Select Space Button A X Button B Z Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
